snippet: A woman who has admitted to killing her 8-year-old son said that the boy had accused dozens of people of sexually abusing him.
abstract: Gigi Jordan, on trial for killing her 8-year-old son in a Manhattan hotel room, testifies that boy had accused dozens of people of sexually abusing him; Jordan's defense has hinged on her perception of reality, and her contention that decision to end her son's life was a mercy killing in an attempted murder-suicide gone awry.
lead_paragraph: A woman who has admitted to killing her 8-year-old son said that the boy had accused dozens of people of sexually abusing him.

headline.main: At Murder Trial, Gigi Jordan Testifies About Abuse She Believed Son Suffered
headline.print_headline: At Murder Trial, Mother Tells ofAbuse She Believed Son Suffered
